name: Black Seas of Infinity
description:
Black Seas of Infinity takes players on a journey of cosmic horror with heavy influence from the entities and creations of H.P Lovecraft. This text based choose-your-own-adventure style game has players awake with no knowledge of where they are or how they got there. Players will experience the environments and aura of the world through the text, images, and music as they decide which paths they will take to uncover what is happening and possibly, save the world. 

Developer: Kevin Dick
